text:
How to distinguish real AirPods Pro from fake
07 Nov 2019, 12:04 by Artyom Bausov
GizmoChina reporters get the most accurate copy of AirPods Pro.
Outwardly, the fake turned out to be difficult to distinguish, they give out only small details. The Chinese even copied the name almost completely - the novelty is called APods Pro.
We talk about the difference between the headphones.
Case
The APods Pro has no Designed by Apple in California on the back. And the metal stiffener is darker than it should be.


Left fake, right original

Plus, the back of the cases has a button to reset the connection. In the original, it is not so distinguished.


On the left is a fake, on the right is the original, the connectors are the same

Inside, there is also a slight difference. The fake has more oval notches for the headphones, while the original has roundish ones. In addition, the cover of this case opens 120 degrees, while the fake one only 90.


Left fake, right original

Another important difference is the blue LED inside the case. AirPods Pro doesn't have one.


Left fake, right original

It is noteworthy that when you open the lid, APods Pro show the same pop-up notification for pairing as the real ones.
Headphones


Left fake, right original

A fake in fact is a little lighter than the original, but outwardly distinguishing them will be a difficult task.
There are only 2 elements by which it is possible to determine the fake: the contact area at the bottom of the headphones, as well as the shape and color of the nozzle for removable nozzles.


On the left is the original, on the right is a fake

Sound
Forget about noise reduction in APods Pro, it's not there. These are simple wireless plugs that also have terrible sound.
The sound output is hollow, but there is no bass.


Fake

GizmoChina reporters believe that the Chinese spent so much time and money copying the new design that they did not have enough money for a decent pair of sound drivers inside.
It is noted that the fake holds the connection well, and all delays are minimized.
Price


Left fake, right original

Well, the last thing that should confuse the buyer is the price. AirPods Pro costs $ 250 or 21 thousand rubles, while APods Pro costs only $ 60 or 3.5 thousand rubles. [GizmoChina]
